name: Do You Still Love Me?
description:
We intended to fit in more story but only just managed to make this in time so instead we'll quickly explain here:

"Do you still love me?" was supposed to be Valentine's Day story about a suspiciously Italian looking plumber who fell into a toxic pool during a work accident and emerged as an abomination. During his fall he also loses the bouquet of roses for his wife, leaving them scattered through the sewer. With nothing left to do he tries to retrieve all the roses and return to his wife hoping she'll still take him. In the end, after a bit of shocked screaming, love obviously succeeds and she does.
There is:
-a double jump
-rats who kill you
-an attack to eat said rats
-spikes who kill you
-and roses to collect

Controls are standard a, w, s ,d ,space and either r, or left click to attack
